items.title: Transformative Research
items.subtitle: Our Focus
items.description: Shifting from fundamental research to applicable data aggregation and evolutionary insights, expanding from action recognition to comprehensive video and scene understanding.

items.title: Join Us

items.title: TIME 2025 Workshop at WWW'25 Sydney
items.description: Join us at the TIME 2025 workshop in Sydney, highlighting Transformative Insights and Multi-faceted Evaluation for responsible AI.

items.title: TIME Lab Website Relaunch
items.description: Our renewed website is now live, showcasing our evolution to TIME³ and commitment to Transparent, Inclusive, Measured, and Ethical AI.

items.title: Open Source Release: MotionNet v2.0
items.description: We have released the latest version of our motion extraction toolkit with improved performance and new features.
